room_title: Escape room "The Secrets of Wizardry" by MagIQ Room in Los Angeles
room_address: 1446 S Robertson Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90035
room_description: There’s a huge trouble! A wicked elf hid your wands and cursed you. Don’t forget that a wizard – to keep his power – needs his wand, a sword, a ring, tabooed things, books, a crystal globe, magic potions, amulets, magic rolls, and last but not least some kind of animal companion, usually a snake or a rat. You have an hour to break the curse with the hidden wands and then leave the building.
